description: An examination of case-studies of Jewish ritual practices and prohibitions which may be investigated archaeologically. Topics to be surveyed include: ritual bathing and ritual baths (miqwaâ€™ot), use of chalk vessels and avoidance of imported pottery, tefillin (phylacteries) and mezuzah, avoidance of figural art, the dietary laws, and the four species ritual.

long_title: Ancient Jewish Ritual Law (Halakhah) and Archaeology
